Lyric:
[by:撒哈拉的眼泪]
[00:00.00]
[00:02.66]
[00:05.04]You got your keys, but where you going?
[00:08.19]The third degree just isn't working
[00:10.83]'Coz you walked out without asking me go
[00:14.31]And if I followed you home, would you be alone?
[00:17.19]
[00:22.85]I checked your phone, 'coz it was beeping
[00:25.44]Are you alone?
[00:26.99]I know you're creepin'
[00:28.39]'Coz you walked out without asking me to go
[00:31.41]But if I followed you home, I hope you're alone
[00:34.01]
[00:34.27]I'm three steps from the edge
[00:37.36]Oh-woah
[00:40.24]Don't push me over it
[00:43.93]Don't you know, don't you know
[00:45.76]
[00:46.00]Every girl is capable of murder if you hurt her
[00:51.40]Watch out you, don't push me any further, any further
[00:56.60]You're not the only one walkin' 'round with a loaded gun
[01:02.28]This little girl is capable of murder 'coz you hurt her
[01:08.04]
[01:08.32]My hands are clean, not yet a killer
[01:10.97]Ain't I your queen
[01:12.38]And did you tell her?
[01:14.12]'Coz you broke down all my shoulda known betters
[01:17.31]And then I followed you home, throwing sticks and stones
[01:19.94]
[01:20.14]I'm two steps from the edge
[01:23.14]Oh-woah
[01:26.03]Don't push me over it
[01:29.98]Don't you know, don't you know
[01:31.30]
[01:31.50]Every girl is capable of murder if you hurt her
[01:36.69]Watch out you, don't push me any further, any further
[01:42.17]You're not the only one walkin' 'round with a loaded gun
[01:47.71]This little girl is capable of murder 'coz you hurt her
[01:54.01]
[02:05.26]Don't you know you should never treat a girl like that?
[02:08.75]Got a good alibi, and my bag's all packed
[02:11.63]Don't you know you should never treat a girl like that?
[02:14.17]'Coz the next one's gonna have the hammer pulled back
[02:17.26]
[02:17.50]Every girl is capable of murder
[02:20.95]So watch out you don't push me any further
[02:26.78]Every girl is capable of murder, if you hurt her
[02:33.60]Watch out you, don't push me any further, any further
[02:39.23]You're not the only one walkin' 'round with a loaded gun
[02:44.82]This little girl is capable of murder,
[02:51.21]This little girl is capable of murder 'coz you hurt her!
[02:57.10]
[02:58.49]
